#summary Text-based API for Handle admin

== Text API ==

Section 4 of the Handle Technical Manual describes a batch-oriented command-line interface to admin Handle. This can be summarized as below, where the recognized command-line keywords are followed by a usage template, with '`LINE`' being a blank line, and the '`+`' character symbolizing that the argument can be repeated on its own new line):

{{{
CREATE
  CREATE handle
  value+
  LINE
DELETE
  DELETE handle
HOME
  HOME address:port:protocol
  handle+
  LINE
UNHOME
  UNHOME address:port:protocol
  handle+
  LINE
ADD
  ADD handle
  value+
  LINE
REMOVE
  REMOVE indexes:handle
MODIFY
  MODIFY handle
  value+
  LINE
AUTHENTICATE
  AUTHENTICATE SECKEY:adm_index:adm_handle
  password
  LINE
  AUTHENTICATE PUBKEY:adm_index:adm_handle
  key_file_path|passphrase
  LINE
  AUTHENTICATE PUBKEY:adm_index:adm_handle
  key_file_path
  LINE
SESSIONSETUP
  SESSIONSETUP
  USESESSION:session_on_or_off_flag
  PUBEXNGKEYFILE:public_exchange_key_file
  PUBEXNGKEYREF:pub_exchange_key_ref_index:pub_exchange_key_ref_handle
  PRIVEXNGKEYFILE:private_exchange_key_file
  PASSPHRASE:pass_phrase_for_private_exchange_key
  OPTIONS:<encrypt><authenticate><fallback on challenge response>
  TIMEOUT:time_out_in_hours
  LINE
}}}
